name: Clean the Room!
description:
Tap to activate your awesome duo vacuum and clean your room.
This beautiful and satisfying game will keep you and your family happy as you use your vacuum powers to get rid of mess in different shapes of rooms.
Features
- Awesome power cats and string balls
- Duo Vacuum powers
- Crazy rooms shapes
- Dirt galore
